title: Medieval Ambient Soundscapes
description: 52 absolutely unique and long lasting ambients of medieval life.
longDescription:
⚠️The background music in the preview is not included

🎧Preview(Youtube)

🎧Preview(SoundCloud)

📃List of sounds

It is impossible to imagine any game without high-quality sound. Every movement and event should be accompanied by sounds that add depth and soul to your projects. TIRIF Studio specializes in the development of high-quality and diverse sounds for any kind and genre of projects.


You can also purchase a complete bundle of all our medieval assets - Medieval Sounds Bundle


In this asset you will find 52 high quality soundscapes of:

  • Barnyard(Medium, Small). At the barnyard you will hear people working with wooden tools, mooing of a cow, crowing of a rooster and other animals.
  • Campsite(Large, Medium, Small). On the campsite, you will hear howling winds, people talking, iron smithing and wooden boxes being dragged.
  • Construction_Site(Large, Medium, Small). On the construction site, you will hear the screams of workers, the rumble of structures, tools and metal.
  • Market(Large, Medium, Small). At the market, you will hear the screams of the peasants in the town square, the rumble of goods from the counter and the clang of iron.
  • Outdoors(Crowded, Empty). In the outdoors, you will hear people talking, their steps and passing carts with horses.


Every soundscape is 1 minute 31 seconds long each.


Important:

 ● Please leave a review if you bought our product

 ● Feel free to ask any question

 ● There is no exclusive license, you can use our sounds in your commercial games
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 52

Number of Audio Cues: 52

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 1:18:52

Supported Development Platforms:

 Windows: Yes

 Mac: Yes
